ModMetaData.name: Rimception
ModMetaData.author: elkyelky
ModMetaData.description:
Ever wondered how tech in Rimworld brings about advanced bionics and spaceflight, but no gaming computers?
Well, that's about to change!*
*(after you have microelectronics researched)
This mod adds a new way for your colonists to get some fun in their day; a sweet gaming desktop rig. Play the hottest game around!
The gaming desktop provides a brand new recreation type (computer gaming) and a rapid way to refill their joy.
If you want to thank me with more than just words, hit up my ko-fi: https://ko-fi.com/elkyelky
